posts.post_title: N172 cards for sale  "Indianapolis Find"  (176 of 217 available)
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Dave Levin
Dave did it again.  We picked up a beautiful lot of Old Judge cards that have never previously been offered to the hobby.
Much like the Oregon find, we were contacted by the children of a 93 year old woman who was in possession of her fathers childhood collection.  
J. E. Woodward of Greenville Ill collected these as a 12 to 14 year old boy.
The grand daughter never knew he was a card collector as they were never shown to her.  Most likely these cards spent many years in a cigar box, not seeing the light of day.
There are many nice cards, some tough hall of fame players, lots of cards from teams a little farther west.
All of the card images are up at my site: https://www.gfg.com/oldjudge/if1.shtml

Here is a sample:

[IMG]https://www.gfg.com/oldjudge/sample.jpg[/IMG]  


I do not have them all priced yet, I am working on it, if you see something you like ask for a price.

Thanks

Dave
